history.proof: intros. unfold RElim, UnfoldUncurry. intros H1 H2. sauto depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment A1 : Type B1 : Type C1 : Type A2 : Type B2 : Type C2 : Type R : rel (A1 * B1 -> C1) (A2 * B2 -> C2) f : A1 -> B1 -> C1 g : A2 -> B2 -> C2 P, Q, Q' : Prop H : RElim R (uncurry f) (uncurry g) P Q H0 : UnfoldUncurry Q Q' H1 : (% R)%rel f g H2 : P Unable to unify "(- ==> ?M1617)%rel ?M1618 ?M1619 -> ?M1620 = ?M1621 /\\ ?M1622 -> ?M1623" with "Q'".

In environment A1 : Type B1 : Type C1 : Type A2 : Type B2 : Type C2 : Type R : rel (A1 * B1 -> C1) (A2 * B2 -> C2) f : A1 -> B1 -> C1 g : A2 -> B2 -> C2 P, Q, Q' : Prop H : RElim R (uncurry f) (uncurry g) P Q H0 : UnfoldUncurry Q Q' H1 : (% R)%rel f g H2 : P Unable to unify "P" with "Q'".

In environment A1 : Type B1 : Type C1 : Type A2 : Type B2 : Type C2 : Type R : rel (A1 * B1 -> C1) (A2 * B2 -> C2) f : A1 -> B1 -> C1 g : A2 -> B2 -> C2 P, Q, Q' : Prop H : RElim R (uncurry f) (uncurry g) P Q H0 : UnfoldUncurry Q Q' H1 : (% R)%rel f g H2 : P Unable to unify "(% R)%rel f g" with "Q'".

original: intros. unfold RElim, UnfoldUncurry. intros H1 H2. apply arrow_pointwise_relim. intros x y. apply H2. apply H1. apply refl.make_conj_impl. intros. apply H. auto.
